synopsis: A young girl embarks on a high-flying rescue mission when her witch doctor grandmother is kidnapped by an evil corporation that wants her recipes.

title: Se Nos Armó La Gorda
synopsis: When the wife gets kidnapped in San Francisco, a long-married couple bored in their relationship realize theyd do anything for each other after all!

title: Villa, itinerario de una pasión
synopsis: At the wake for revolutionary Pancho Villa, several of his many wives confront one another while recalling the dead heros spirited, amorous life.

title: Misión en Mocland: Una aventura superespacial
synopsis: When their planet is conquered by enemies, three denizens of an alien world are chosen by their queen to find a mythical, energy-producing substance.

title: The Candidate
synopsis: At his country estate, a rich businessman who wants to be president is groomed by a campaign team to create an image palatable to middle-class voters.

title: 2 rivales casi iguales
synopsis: An idiosyncratic riverside village makes its mark on the entire country when two of its native sons lock horns in rival national political campaigns.

title: Una cierta verdad
synopsis: Over the course of one year, this immersive documentary follows the lives and unorthodox perspectives of five patients in a mental health hospital.

title: La Esquina del Diablo
synopsis: After her cop father is killed, a woman earns a spot in special forces and is soon tasked with taking down a drug dealer in a dangerous neighborhood.

title: Cloroformo
synopsis: A glimpse into the lives of each boxer: their dreams, their ambitions, their triumphs and their defeats, both in and out of the ring.

title: Neckan
synopsis: In 1956 Morocco, a Spanish lawyer who was adopted as a child unravels a murderous plot as he searches for the truth about his biological family.

title: Secuestro
synopsis: When her son is kidnapped and later found traumatized, a lawyer takes justice into her own hands, causing events that spiral out of control.

title: Acapulco La vida va
synopsis: Three lifelong friends travel to Acapulco ostensibly so one of them can find his lost love, but the real reason behind the trip holds some surprises.

title: The Red Thread
synopsis: Seven years after their fateful first encounter, Abril and Manuel meet again. Although theyre both married, their attraction has only grown.

title: Daughter of the Lake
synopsis: Follow an Andean womans fight to stop a Peruvian mining firm from evicting her from her land in order to access the gold under her precious lake.

title: Se Nos Armó La Gorda Al Doble: Misión Las Vegas
synopsis: Telling his wife that theyre going on a second honeymoon, Polilla sets out for Sin City to help his friend track down the man who killed his father.

title: El Dandy
synopsis: A law professor is enlisted by Mexicos attorney general to join a special operations unit infiltrating the capitals most notorious drug cartel.

title: Route 35
synopsis: A federal agent battles dangerous drug cartels with the help of informants, who are driven to risk their lives for revenge, greed, fear or love.

title: Mea Culpa
synopsis: Raw and outspoken, comedian Alexis de Anda bares her soul about weddings, exercise, sex, gynecologists, drugs and much more in this stand-up special.

title: Alan SaldaÃ±a: Mi vida de pobre
synopsis: Mexican comic Alan SaldaÃ±a has fun with everything from the pressure of sitting in an exit row to maxing out his credit card in this stand-up special.

title: Hoy Soy Nadie
synopsis: A newspaper employee who commits fraud hangs on to his freedom by fulfilling the company owners request to infiltrate the lives of 15 young people.

title: Mau Nieto: Viviendo sobrio… desde el bar
synopsis: Performing at a bar, Mexican stand-up comedian Mau Nieto dishes on his modest upbringing, his failed relationships and his attempts to stay sober.

title: Kimura
synopsis: An ex-fighter with a guilty past returns to seek forgiveness from his brother but ends up having to fight him in the notorious Kimura MMA tournament.

title: Eyengui, El Dios Del Sueño
synopsis: Clans of Baka people in Cameroon unite to defend themselves against cannibals hired by loggers to scare them away from their sacred jungle habitat.

title: César y Zaín
synopsis: After meeting online to play chess, 20-somethings César, a Madrid Catholic, and Zain, a Delhi Muslim, swap lives for six weeks in a cultural exchange.

title: Arango y Sanint: Ríase el show
synopsis: Colombian stand-up comedians Antonio Sanint and Julián Arango impersonate an Argentine visitor and a cabbie, and a pair of dirty old men at the opera.

title: Odile
synopsis: Firsthand witnesses and weather experts recall the life-changing damage caused by Hurricane Odile when it hit Los Cabos, Mexico, on Sept. 14, 2014.

title: La Fiscal de Hierro
synopsis: Prosecutor Silvana DurÃ¡n strives to bring the drug lord who killed her father to justice while confronting uncomfortable truths about her family.

title: Si saben cómo me pongo ¿pá qué me invitan?
synopsis: When four unhappy couples attend a spiritual retreat at a resort to try and solve their relationship troubles, shenanigans ensue.

title: El jugador
synopsis: While delivering cash to his bosss rogue grandson in Mar del Plata, a former gambler faces difficult decisions along the way.

title: Caravana
synopsis: Thousands of miles apart, two boys embark on treks with their salt-trading families: one across Nigers Ténéré; the other through Nepals Himalayas.

title: Coco y Raulito: Carrusel de ternura
synopsis: A study in contrasts, comedy partners and good friends Coco Celis and Raúl Meneses alternate separate stand-up sets for double the laughs.

title: Alejandro Riaño: Especial de stand up
synopsis: Colombian comedian Alejandro Riaño discusses the perks of dating a she-wolf, styles of dancing, the quirks of Bogotá men and soccer game announcers.

title: Fernando Sanjiao: Hombre
synopsis: Argentine actor and comedian Fernando Sanjiao uses humor and impersonations to explore the concepts of masculinity and fatherhood in modern times.

title: Sebastián Marcelo Wainraich
synopsis: Argentine comedian Sebastián Wainraich highlights the comedy in everyday life, from minibars to reasons why funerals are better than weddings.

title: Black Man White Skin
synopsis: This film chronicles the health and social problems that African albinos face and details the fight waged on their behalf by advocacy groups in Spain.

title: Legend Quest: Happy Birthday to You!
synopsis: Heres to a legendary birthday filled with presents and cake -- and best wishes that a ghostly Birthday Crasher wont turn up among your guests!

title: Apaches
synopsis: A young journalist is forced into a life of crime to save his father and family in this series based on the novel by Miguel Sáez Carral.

title: Ricardo OFarrill Abrazo Genial
synopsis: Ricardo OFarrill brings his sharp, observational humor to the stage with a relentless sarcasm and specific Mexican sensibility. Prepare for mockery.

title: Historias de las Montañas de la Bruma
synopsis: Raised in Spain, Laiqi travels to the land of her ancestors to film endangered species in Chinas preserves, where she finds a vanishing way of life.

title: El Señor De Sipán
synopsis: Learn about Perus ancient Moche civilization, which made headlines in 1987 when the treasure-filled tomb of a third-century ruler was unearthed.

title: Fabrizio Copano: Solo pienso en mi
synopsis: Fabrizio Copano takes audience participation to the next level in this stand-up set while reflecting on sperm banks, family WhatsApp groups and more.

title: Lady, la vendedora de rosas
synopsis: This series tells the life story of Colombian film star Lady Tabares, who was plucked off the mean streets to star in a film and quickly rose to fame.

title: Nothing in Return
synopsis: A teen from a dysfunctional home in Madrid skips school to hang out with a friend and raise bail money for a shop owner who fences stolen bike parts.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Jane and Payne
synopsis: Capturing the long-planned meeting of primatologist Jane Goodall and whale conservationist Roger Payne, this film celebrates both scientists careers.

title: Criminal Mastermind
synopsis: When a girl turns up savagely slain, her distraught mother begins a perilous mission to prove that a renowned psychiatrist is a psychotic killer.

title: Bomb Scared
synopsis: In this dark comedy, a dysfunctional group of wannabe Basque terrorists awaits word about a new mission while Spain makes a run at the World Cup title.

title: I Am Me!
synopsis: Aspiring hip-hop star Francisco builds a name for himself as a musical artist while his conscience helps him through family drama and discrimination.

title: The Labèque Way
synopsis: Sibling pianists Katia and Marielle Labèque take the stage for bold performances with talented friends, tackling pieces by Gershwin, Ravel and more.

title: The Bribe of Heaven
synopsis: When a priest refuses to celebrate a funeral Mass for a suicide victim, villagers in an Andean town in the 70s makes waves with a religious strike.

title: El Che
synopsis: Spanish-Mexican writer Paco Ignacio Taibo II hits the road to trace the footsteps of Ernesto Che Guevara and sheds new light on the revolutionary.

title: Franco Escamilla: Por la anécdota
synopsis: Mexican stand-up comedian Franco Escamilla draws his jokes from real-life experiences -- and hes willing to do anything for new material.

title: Club de Cuervos Presents: The Ballad of Hugo Sánchez
synopsis: Chava Iglesiass doting personal assistant Hugo Sánchez is tasked with leading Club de Cuervos to victory in Nicaragua -- if only his mom will let him.

title: OFF COURSE
synopsis: Fed up with the uselessness of their degrees and swayed by a TV commercial, two Spaniards head to Berlin for work but find it not quite as advertised.

title: Natalia Valdebenito: Gritona
synopsis: Chiles Natalia Valdebenito hits Santiagos Teatro Caupolicán with a one-woman show steeped in irony, a dash of improv and her own personal style.

title: Me and the Alien
synopsis: Hoping to pump up their sound, a punk band hires Pepe, a keyboardist with Down Syndrome, but tensions erupt when he steals the show with his talent.

title: Edha
synopsis: Revenge, passion and dark secrets push a successful fashion designer and single mother to her limits when she meets a handsome and mysterious man.

title: Lion Heart
synopsis: A lawyer feels an instant connection with a man she meets over the phone, but must confront her own prejudices when she discovers hes very short.

title: Eves Apple
synopsis: Interviews with global policymakers and girls in Gambia and Kenya detail the horrors of female genital mutilation and the growing efforts to end it.

title: A Sort of Family
synopsis: An Argentine doctor faces legal and ethical challenges when she travels to the countryside to pick up the infant she has been waiting to adopt.
